title: Comment: 1 litre = 1/1000th of 1 Bucket.  Some...
description: 1 litre = 1/1000th of 1 Bucket.  Some other mods prefer to say 1 millibucket, or 1mB.

replies.body: As a further explanation, 1 Block in Minecraft is generally defined as 1 cubic meter.  By SI measurements, 1 cubic meter is defined as equal to 1,000 litres.  1 Bucket will store exactly 1 full Block of fluid.  Therefore, 1 Bucket will store 1 cubic meter, or 1000 litres, of fluid.
